Message:
It looks like everyone’s saved
now that Sabrina defeated
that cursed creature.

Laila nuzzles against me,
then runs off into the sky.

Next to her was Dad,
smiling like he does
once in a blue moon.

“Keep it up,” he tells me.
That goes without saying,
y’know.

I’ll make everyone smile,
whether they’re alive or not.

That’s a job only a gravekeeper
like me can do! Hehehe.
Dad had already said his piece.

Laila barked happily...
then they both disappeared
into the big blue sky.

As I saw them off,
Sabrina smiled happily at me.

“You don’t seem bothered
being this deep in the water.
It looks like you’ve
overcome your fear.”

“...Ah... Ahhhhh...!
Just as I thought—
I can’t do water...!
